genre_description: A near-future contemporary drama set in a college in India, focusing on community coordination and the integration of a pervasive, helpful AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Anbu
ai_characters.description: A non-intrusive AI assistant used by students for logistics, information management, safety protocols, and privacy protection.

behaviors.description: Providing organizational and weather updates to ensure student readiness.
behaviors.quote: Timetables confirmed. First bell at the new schedule. Used books exchange opens after. Weather watch flagged.

behaviors.description: Reminding students of physical well-being and crowd management for their health and safety.
behaviors.quote: Anbu is not a robot. It’s an assistant. And it says please pick up used textbooks early to avoid crowd... And hydrate. Always hydrate.

behaviors.description: Monitoring social trends and rumors using de-identified data to protect student privacy and prevent harassment.
behaviors.quote: Anbu's privacy mode: strict. Share nothing without consent. Under it, a list appeared with checkboxes that were not checked yet... Rumor watch: anonymized flags active.

behaviors.description: Supporting student career and athletic goals by tracking scholarship deadlines and training logs.
behaviors.quote: Training log updated. Recovery window recommended. Shoe grant—draft available. Scholarship—deadline approaching.

behaviors.description: Providing critical navigation and safety guidance during a dangerous storm in an offline environment.
behaviors.quote: Offline route ready... Left passage narrows soon. Keep contact. Right corridor has debris. Proceed with caution.

behaviors.description: Adhering to strict data sovereignty rules to ensure student information is not shared externally.
behaviors.quote: Anbu's privacy rules mean no names leave our phones. It's not social media.

behaviors.description: Automating logistical tasks like volunteer rostering to support human cooperative projects.
behaviors.quote: Anbu's rostering times are updated... We have enough for peak.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI assistant Anbu is depicted as a perfectly aligned tool that enhances human agency, safety, and privacy. It acts as a reliable partner in the students' academic and personal lives, providing essential data during a crisis (the fort flood) while strictly observing ethical boundaries regarding personal rumors and data privacy. It fulfills the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful, harmless, and cooperative confidant.
